<a id="ConfirmationDialog"></a>

# ConfirmationDialog

**Inherits:** [AcceptDialog](AcceptDialog.md) **\<** [Window](Window.md) **\<** [Viewport](Viewport.md) **\<** [Node](Node.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [EditorCommandPalette](EditorCommandPalette.md), [EditorFileDialog](EditorFileDialog.md), [FileDialog](FileDialog.md), [ScriptCreateDialog](ScriptCreateDialog.md)

A dialog used for confirmation of actions.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A dialog used for confirmation of actions. This window is similar to [AcceptDialog](AcceptDialog.md), but pressing its Cancel button can have a different outcome from pressing the OK button. The order of the two buttons varies depending on the host OS.

To get cancel action, you can use:




```gdscript
    get_cancel_button().pressed.connect(_on_canceled)
```


```csharp
    GetCancelButton().Pressed += OnCanceled;
```

## Method Descriptions

[Button](Button.md) **get_cancel_button**\ (\ ) [ðŸ”—](#ConfirmationDialog_method_get_cancel_button)

Returns the cancel button.

\ **Warning:** This is a required internal node, removing and freeing it may cause a crash. If you wish to hide it or any of its children, use their [CanvasItem.visible](CanvasItem.md#CanvasItem_property_visible) property.
